meanings: wish, hope, want, (formal) desire, (간절히) long for, (기대하다) look forward to

meanings.meaning: if wishes were horses, beggars would/might ride

vlive.korean: 그런 거 안 바래! 그런 거 안 바란다고 - 내가 왜? I don't want that! I don't want that! - Why should I? 듣기 View video EXID : [EXID(이엑스아이디)] CUTExid_솔지가 정하는 연애하고 싶은 멤버 1위는!?
vlive.english: I don't want that! I don't want that! - Why should I?

vlive.korean: 부산행 대박나길 바란다고... and hope "Train to Busan" will be a major hit. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : 영화 '부산행(TRAIN TO BUSAN)' 무비토크 라이브
vlive.english: and hope "Train to Busan" will be a major hit.

vlive.korean: 인정을 베푸는데 소홀히 하지 않기 바란다고 적혀있고요. So, don't be too rash on what you provide. 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : [치열업] 브이앱 1주년♡새해 인사
vlive.english: So, don't be too rash on what you provide.

vlive.korean: 부디 행복하라고, 너보다 좋은 사람 만나길 바란다고. You said you wanted me to be happy and find a better person than you. 듣기 View video GAVYNJ : 신청곡 올려주세용
vlive.english: You said you wanted me to be happy and find a better person than you.

vlive.korean: 진정한 행복을 바란다면... If you want true happiness... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 25 🦊

examples.korean: Jiang said China hopes tensions can be eased through diplomatic efforts. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 장 유 대변인은 중국은 외교적 노력을 통해 긴장이 완화될 수 있기를 바란다고 말했습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Jiang said China hopes tensions can be eased through diplomatic efforts. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We hope to figure things out soon. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 곧 문제가 해결되기를 바란다.'고 말했다. Neungyule
examples.english: We hope to figure things out soon. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Seoul said it wants an apology from Pyongyang before they can restart the talks or food aid. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 남한은, 남북한이 회담이나 식량 지원을 재기하기 전에 북한이 사과를 하길 바란다고 말했다. Neungyule
examples.english: Seoul said it wants an apology from Pyongyang before they can restart the talks or food aid. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Please tell him I wish him a speedy recovery. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 남편 분께 빨리 회복하시길 바란다고 전해주세요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Please tell him I wish him a speedy recovery. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If you see her again please tell her we miss her and can’t wait for her to get back to work. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 혹시 그녀를 다시 보면 우리가 그녀를 보고 싶어하니 어서 사무실 나와서 일하길 바란다고 전해줘요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If you see her again please tell her we miss her and can’t wait for her to get back to work. Add to Wordbook
